original_title: The National Industry Exhibition 2023 powered by Dialog Enterprise
original_body_lines: Dialog Enterprise, the corporate ICT solutions arm of Dialog Axiata PLC recently announced its commitment to support the National Industry Exhibition 2023 as the title sponsor. This is the second consecutive year Dialog Enterprise is sponsoring the event as the main sponsor, which was an overwhelming success in 2022.

Accelerating the recovery of Sri Lankan economy and industries after the recent down-turn, Dialog Enterprise together with the Industries Development Board of Sri Lanka embarked on a mission to provide a much impressive platform than ever before for the industries of Sri Lanka through the exhibition.

Speaking at the event, Dr Saranga Alahapperuma, Chairman, Industrial Development Board said, “We are pleased to launch Industries 2023 – National Industry Exhibition to provide a unique platform and marketplace for our local industries and as an opportunity for the public to experience the new products and solutions from a multi-disciplinary of local industries. We would like to thank our Title Sponsor – Dialog Enterprise for joining us in our shared vision of furthering these industrial revival efforts and invite local industries to join the exhibition.”

Navin Peiris, Group Chief Officer of Dialog Enterprise added “As the ICT solutions arm of the leading Quad-Play Connectivity provider of Sri lanka we are proud to support the national effort of reviewing the industries of Sri Lanka through Industry 2023. Dialog Enterprise caters its solutions to industry clients from the smallest home businesses to the industry leaders across multiple sectors and we expect to showcase the state-of-the-art enterprise technology at the exhibition. We would also like to invite all entrepreneurs and businesses to represent and visit Industry 2023 this June.”

Industries 2023 powered by Dialog Enterprise will be held from 22nd June till the 25th at the BMICH. Organisers expect over 700 stalls featuring a range of entrepreneurs and SME & large-scale exhibitors from over 20 industries and expect a recorded number of visitors.
